entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 60 percent chance of showers later this afternoon. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023
